# type

**Type**

The type of In-App Purchase products you can offer in your app.

## Declaration

```swift
string type
```

## Product information

- **productId**: The unique identifier of the product.
- **subscriptionGroupIdentifier**: The identifier of the subscription group that the subscription belongs to.
- **quantity**: The number of purchased consumable products.
